alert.note: Alert for South Central Mountains; Southwest Chaves County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 27 at 11:15AM MST until December 29 at 12:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...West and southwest winds 30 to 50 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...South Central Mountains and Southwest Chaves County. * WHEN...From late tonight through Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates.

area.areaDesc: South Central Mountains; Southwest Chaves County
